field.label: Title
field.hint: Enter the main title of the dataset.
field.required: You must enter a main title for this dataset.

field.label: Type
field.hint: Select the type of content of the item.
field.required: You must enter a type for this dataset.

field.label: Depositor
field.hint: Enter the name of the person entering this record.
field.required: You must enter a Depositor for this dataset.

field.label: Data Creator
field.hint: Enter the names of the data creators / principal investigators of this item. If the name of the data creator is unknown please be sure to fill out the Publisher field.

field.label: Data Publisher
field.hint: Enter the name of the organisation or service responsible for making the data available. Example: University of Edinburgh. School of GeoSciences. Institute of Geography. Note: Publisher is a mandatory field if no Creator is specified.

field.label: Funder
field.hint: Select each agency that funded the creation of the dataset.

field.label: Embargo Date
field.hint: The date on which files will become available to download. Enter the date 'YYYY-MM-DD' when the embargo should expire (up to 5 years from today). If no embargo is required, leave blank.

field.label: Alternative Title
field.hint: If the dataset has any alternative titles, please enter them here.

field.label: Dataset Description
field.hint: Please provide a summary description of the dataset or an abstract of the study in which the data was generated.

field.label: Subject Classification
field.hint: Select the most appropriate subject for the study as a whole.

field.label: Subject Keywords
field.hint: Enter as many appropriate subject keywords or phrases as you like.

field.label: Relation (Is Version Of)
field.hint: If there is another version of this dataset lodged in this repository or another archive (for example, in the UK Data Archive) enter the URI / URL of the corresponding item.

field.label: Relation (Is Referenced By)
field.hint: Have you published a paper based on this dataset? If so, enter the URI /URL. If there is an Open Access version lodged in a publications repository (for example, UK PubMed Central), that is the preferred URI /URL.

field.label: Supersedes
field.hint: If this dataset supersedes an earlier dataset deposited in this repository enter the URI /URL of the previous dataset.

field.label: Superseded By
field.hint: Only fill out this field if this dataset has been superseded by a later data deposit. Enter the URI /URL of the newest data item.

field.label: Source
field.hint: If dataset includes data created by a source other than the data creator, please specify. Example: 2001 Census; Census Area Statistics. Optionally, add a URI /URL to the source.

field.label: Dataset Description (TOC)
field.hint: Enter names of data and documentation files associated with this item with a brief description of each. If file descriptions are included in documentation (such as a Readme.txt file) refer to the filename of the relevant documentation.

field.label: Spatial Coverage: Country
field.hint: Enter the country to which the data relate, if relevant.

field.label: Spatial Coverage: Place
field.hint: Enter the most appropriate placenames to which the data relate, if relevant.

field.label: Language
field.hint: Select the language of the data files and/or documentation.
